comments: He is qualified, informative, approachable,personable; presenting in a manner that urges students to seek more, as evidenced by re-enrollment of former students in his classes. Subject is covered thoroughly and enhanced by slides and video presentation. Strong participation in non-class room activities offered enhances hands-on learning.
